title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: People prefers partners who are good in bed, who can quench and satisfy their sex desires, then same people love for money is endless ,they want a rich partner who will take care of their needs. A wealthy person believes time is money and they use it wisely and less sex ,while a money challenged person  'poor' has all the time in the world for pleasure.There is 70% chances that money can keep marriage ,how much more can good sex without money can keep a marriage, would you stand your poor partner and stay married to them even when they poor but good in bed, good sex performance and desires reasons?What will be your decisions

comments.author: Crpyto hunter
comments.body: Because many people now a days don't believe on marriage again,the believe on satisfaction of people that come to them and go for money, what we've to do is for us to teach the young ones how life is and how to benefit from it when it come to difficulty and in friendship,cause what this is were the parent teach their children and what the come to see in the family,Maybe it may happen the separation of the their family may all  so cause to the children such as to sleep out and following their friends to club and all etc. So the training should come from the house first before someone should call for the attention of the parent, to show the attitude of their children out.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Who cares about a broke guy who is good in bed? You said it yourself that rich people rate their life on a time well spent. A loaded dude can pay for sex not just because he can't have it free, but just because he's rich. We are in an era where even love is measured by the number of gifts one receives. So obviously a marriage cannot just survive on good sex.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I think sex and money are really important but not for everyone as a general rule. I think many people are perfectly satisfied in a marriage with very little sex and sometimes very little money. Personally, I require quite a bit of sex to feel satisfied in a long-term relationship. And I also am quite ambitious so I think money is pretty important for getting some of my basic needs met. However, people have very different needs and we shouldn’t judge others for choosing to live without sex or not craving luxury.

comments.author: Mask00
comments.body: Of Course In Our Life Sex important but Without Money Sex Not valuable. Because If you have Lots Of Money Then Your Sex Life is So Good and Happy Sex Life.But If You Don't have money Then Of course its painful for you.So Sex &Money Its Important in Everyone's Life

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: Has everyone forgotten about love?))Of course, you can win the jackpot and find a partner with money who will suit you in sex and at the same time you will not be tied only in the financial side. But if you look easier, then of course money and sex are close

comments.author: MaryMany
comments.body: Alas no, not even a child can hold a marriage together.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on May 26, 2022, 03:51:01 PMWho cares about a broke guy who is good in bed? You said it yourself that rich people rate their life on a time well spent. A loaded dude can pay for sex not just because he can't have it free, but just because he's rich. We are in an era where even love is measured by the number of gifts one receives. So obviously a marriage cannot just survive on good sex. Well good sex is great,but food is more important.Living in a place that is fairly safe is important.So good sex and some money should work out fine.1)Sex is complex in long term relationships married or not married (long term = 10+ years)2) Good sex is one part needed3)some money is another part needed4)Love or like or attraction is needed.5) Luck is important.so  you can have it all and get covid 19 die and the marriage is ended.My wife and I both had covid-19 we were sick for a long time.Both of us did not give a fuck about sex we wanted to get healthy over all other things.We healed and back to a nicer life.and we are back to having the things needed to be happy.

comments.author: rodel caling
comments.body: well for me it should be in equal. as a man we know we love it. but ask your partner because we know that a girl can live without any sex so its should be equal that you have both.I am not rich but I also have a dream that to be in a good status of money,because I know Im lack of that..but atleast I have a job that can support me. And also about sex I have a partner in life and Im am satisfied with it..So for me it doesn't have to choose if sex or money. Just be contented. We can live with out sex but money should exist in every human being to live as well.
